dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.fillInAllFields: Fill in all fields to complete your profile
dashboard.promotionPostsDescription: Promotion posts will be used as marketing material to promote your brand on Instagram and the event website.
dashboard.userDashboardDescription: Right now, dashboards are available for staff, writers, and exhibitors. We're working on bringing a personalized experience for you too. Hang tight.

brands.title: Brands
brands.deleteConfirm: This action can't be undone. This will permanently delete {count} selected {noun}.
brands.deleteSingleConfirm: This action can't be undone. This will permanently delete this brand.

brandsImport.title: Import Brands
brandsImport.description: Upload an Excel file to import multiple brands at once
brandsImport.downloadTemplate: Download the template file with sample data

brandsForm.pressEnterToAdd: Press Enter to add a category

orders.title: Orders
orders.placeFirstOrder: Place your first order to get started.
orders.howToOrderInfo: To place a new order, go to the Brands page, select your brand, then click Order Form on the desired event.

orderForm.title: Order Form
orderForm.noProducts: No products available for this event.
orderForm.specialInstructions: Any special instructions or notes for this order...
orderForm.reviewBeforeSubmitting: Please review your order before submitting.
orderForm.deadlinePassed: The order form deadline has passed. You can no longer submit orders.

promotionPosts.title: Promotion Posts
promotionPosts.aspectRatio: Aspect ratio 1:1 · 1080 x 1080px · PNG or JPG
promotionPosts.caption: Caption
promotionPosts.deleteConfirm: This post will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?
promotionPosts.deadlinePassed: The promotion post deadline has passed. You can no longer upload posts.
promotionPosts.limitReached: You've reached the promotion post limit ({limit}). Contact event organizer to increase your limit.

settings.failedToUpdatePassword: Failed to update password. Please try again.
settings.chooseTheme: Choose your preferred theme for the interface.

auth.loginWithGoogle: Log in with your Google account
auth.orEnterCredentials: or enter your email and password below
auth.byContinuing: By continuing, you agree to our
auth.signUpWithGoogle: Sign up with your Google account
auth.name: Name
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

exhibitorDashboard.fasciaNameDesc: Name displayed on your booth fascia board (max. 24 characters, uppercase only)
exhibitorDashboard.fasciaNameWarning: Changes to fascia name after the deadline will incur an admin fee
exhibitorDashboard.formChecklistDesc: Make sure all required forms are completed and returned before the deadline
exhibitorDashboard.onSiteOrderSurcharge: Orders placed during the on-site period are subject to a 50% price increase
exhibitorDashboard.boothDesignDeadlineDesc: Deadline to submit booth layout and 3D design for approval
exhibitorDashboard.electricalServiceDesc: MCB installation and power supply from the hall mains to your booth
exhibitorDashboard.lightingFurnitureDesc: Lights, tables, chairs, showcases, and other booth equipment
exhibitorDashboard.audioVisualDesc: Sound systems, TVs, LED screens, projectors, cameras, and other AV equipment
exhibitorDashboard.internetServiceDesc: Wired internet connection to your booth area (exhibitors must bring their own router)
exhibitorDashboard.freightForwardingDesc: Shipping and customs clearance through the official freight forwarder
exhibitorDashboard.hotelAccommodationDesc: Partner hotel reservations near the exhibition venue
exhibitorDashboard.electricalNotes: Rates include MCB and power supply for the duration of the exhibition
exhibitorDashboard.electricalWarning: MCB 10 Amp and above does not include a socket. Socket + Installation must be ordered separately
exhibitorDashboard.internetNote: Exhibitors must provide their own internet router
exhibitorDashboard.performanceBondDesc: Required deposit for contractors before commencing work in the exhibition hall
exhibitorDashboard.bondRefundDesc: Deposit is refunded after the booth is dismantled on schedule with no damages
exhibitorDashboard.refundCheque: Cheque/Giro: 14 working days after dismantling is complete
exhibitorDashboard.refundTransfer: Bank transfer: 30 working days from the day after dismantling is complete
exhibitorDashboard.boothDesignRequired: 3D booth visualization from all angles must be submitted
exhibitorDashboard.wallCovering: Walls taller than adjacent booths must be covered with neutral solid material (white or black)
exhibitorDashboard.fireSafetyDesc: False ceilings or suspended ceilings are not permitted without approval from the Fire Safety Bureau
exhibitorDashboard.electricalByContractor: All electrical installation within the booth must be carried out by the Official Contractor
exhibitorDashboard.overtimePenaltyDesc: Extended build-up or dismantling: IDR 25,000,000/hour per booth (excl. tax)
exhibitorDashboard.fasciaBoard: Fascia board with company name and booth number
exhibitorDashboard.paymentConfirmation: Please confirm your payment by sending proof of transfer immediately
exhibitorDashboard.nonRefundable: Orders that have been processed cannot be cancelled, changed, or refunded
exhibitorDashboard.taxNote: All bank charges and tax fees are borne by the exhibitor
exhibitorDashboard.itemsBasedOnAvailability: All rental items are subject to availability
exhibitorDashboard.onSiteSurchargeNote: Orders after the deadline are subject to a 50% surcharge. Prices on the order form no longer apply
exhibitorDashboard.priorityOrdering: Priority is given to orders received before the deadline
exhibitorDashboard.orderNonCancellable: Orders that have been placed and processed cannot be cancelled or refunded
exhibitorDashboard.allPricesPreTax: All prices are exclusive of tax
